summary: An assistant district attorney works with a detective to catch a serial killer who uses traps to lure his victims.
cast: Warren Dycus|Amanda Schull|Michael Nouri|Coby Ryan McLaughlin|Gina Gershon|Anne Ramsay|Eric Michael Roy|John Kapelos|Joanna Miles|Daniel Lench|Valerie Wildman|Lilah Richcreek Estrada|Carlease Burke|Enrique Almeida|Amrapali Ambegaokar|Yau-Gene Chan|Ren Hanami|Manuel Urrego|Kimberly Atkinson|Leslie Wong|Richard Cansino|Stefan Chase|Will Blagrove|James Avery
title: El asesino del laberinto
